vi.welcome: Chào mừng các bạn\nđến với game

localization.en:
Overall Loading Cancel (Not logged in) Please enable internet (WIFI/Data) to use this feature! Opps! Adult feature.
Please answer this question: (Auto close in @secs) Category: @cat (@idxCat/@totalCat)
File: (@idxFile/@totalFile) Downloading require content Beat me on @cat if you dare at @url #fastHandEnglish. Sharing Failed! Sharing Done! Please login @type account in System setting! Your In-App Purchases feature has been disable. To enable, go to Settings > General > Restrictions. Thank you for purchasing our full app. Accept to start downloading extra contents... Please enable game center! Error while making purchase: Please enable google play service! Fast Hand English Do you really want to exit? (The app will miss you) Rate Share on: Game is paused! Do you really want to quit? Change Subject Unlock NOW all @num subjects and remove ads for only @price$ Restore purchase! Again Score: Score: @score
Best: @best
Subject played: @subject Slow Fast Choose a Category (Mode @mode) Coming
Soon Adjectives, Animal Parts Animals 1 Animals 2 Body 1 Body 2 City Clothes 1 Clothes 2 Colors Computer Food 1 Food 2 Furniture Garden Hospital Jobs Kitchen Letters Nature Numbers 1 Numbers 2 Personal Positions Sports Stationary Transport Verbs 1 Verbs 2
